name: carex blanda
description: A nice ever-green sedge that is extremely versatile.Â  Plant it in full sun or full shade with moist to semi-dry conditions. A low-mounded profile makes it great for landscaping. It is deer/rabbit resistant.Dormant bare root plants ship each year during optimal transplanting season: Fall (October) or Spring (April/May).
features: Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
